name: Vitória Régia
description:
Legend has it that Naiá India was the most beautiful of the tribe. However, when he saw Jaci, the Moon, reflected in the waters of the stream, he wanted to go live with her in the sky and become a star.

For days and nights on end, Naiá stayed there, on the edge of the stream, waiting and admiring the reflection of the moon, without eating or drinking. And she ended up wasting away and dying.

With pity, the Moon turned it into a different star: a water star. And that's why the Vitória Régia flowers only open at night.

The Vitória Régia is an aquatic plant originally from the Amazon. Its circular leaves can be over two meters in diameter and its delicate flowers bloom in January and February, opening only at night and lasting 48 hours. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
